LanguageData.ARA_Possession.label: Arachnae Protozoan
LanguageData.ARA_Possession.description: This creature's body is controlled by an Arachnae Protozoan. The body's original owner can no longer return.
LanguageData.ARA_Facehugger_LowOperation.label: Arachnae Protozoan
LanguageData.ARA_Facehugger_LowOperation.description: The Arachnae Protozoan is very fragile when separated from the host, and its small body cannot perform specialized tasks.
